mapper.select: SELECT employee_id as id, email, first_name as firstName, last_name as lastName, phone_number as phoneNumber, salary, hire_date as hireDate, job_id as jobId, manager_id as managerId, department_id as departmentId FROM employees WHERE employee_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO employees(first_name, last_name, email, salary, hire_date, job_id, manager_id, department_id) VALUES(#{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{email}, #{salary}, #{hireDate}, #{jobId}, #{managerId}, #{departmentId})
mapper.update: UPDATE employees SET first_name = #{firstName}, last_name = #{lastName}, email = #{email}, salary = #{salary}, hire_date = #{hireDate}, job_id = #{jobId}, manager_id = #{managerId}, department_id = #{departmentId} WHERE employee_id = #{id}
